ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Thai Green Curry Paste
340g pack essential Waitrose British Beef Frying Steak, trimmed of excess fat
½ cucumber portion, cut into matchsticks

instructions.step: Mix the Thai curry paste with the oil and toss the steak in the mixture until evenly coated. Place on a preheated griddle pan for 1-2 minutes each side, then allow to rest for 2-3 minutes before slicing.
Meanwhile, arrange the salad onions, cucumber and coriander on a large platter and add the steak.
Using the leaves as wraps, add some steak, vegetables and coriander, roll up, dip into the chilli sauce and enjoy. Serve with sticky rice.
